page.title: 10ENERGY & HEALTH
page.content: Electricity runs from the National Grid.There are often breaks in supply during storms.Some homes have gas supplied but not all.Heating is otherwise provided by oil,solid fuel & solar panels. Health:The area is mainly looked after by Dr.Jeremy Boucher in Broadmayne & his nursing team.Part of Poxwell is covered by Weymouth G.P.s.There is a dispensing pharmacy within the practice.Patients requiring hospital care go to Dorset County Hospital, Dorchester or Weymouth & District Hos.& are covered by other facilities attached to West Dorset Health Authority.There is also the Winterbourne Private Hospital. Inhabitants visit dentists in Dorchester,Weymouth & Wool.Some people may require specialist care & they are referred to specialiist hos.
